typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ProjectID as string,
		Context as string,
		{Type of tool} as string,
		{Area of change} as string,
		{Service themes} as string,
		{Date of data collection} as string,
		id as string,
		Course_name as string,
		Username as string,
		Email as string,
		{Phone number} as string,
		Title as string,
		{First name} as string,
		{Middle name} as string,
		{Last name} as string,
		idnumber as string,
		Gender as string,
		{Year of birth} as string,
		{Organization/ Company name} as string,
		{Type of entity} as string,
		{Sub-type of entity} as string,
		{Professional status} as string,
		Functional_title as string,
		Howlong as string,
		Priorexperience as string,
		Address as string,
		Cityname as string,
		Country as string,
		{Country code} as string,
		Pobox as string,
		Postalcode as string,
		Nationality as string,
		Skype as string,
		Aim as string,
		Yahoo as string,
		Msn as string,
		Profile_field_Supervisor as string,
		{Service theme} as string,
		Cityregion as string,
		{Job title} as string,
		Size as string,
		Certification_date as string,
		Certified as string,
		Cohort as string,
		Uniqueid as string,
		User_id as string,
		Enrol_time as string,
		FILE_NAME as string,
		LOAD_TIMESTAMP as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> FetchingSourceNames
FetchingSourceNames select(mapColumn(
		DATA_SOURCE_NAME = FILE_NAME
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectFileName
SelectFileName aggregate(groupBy(DATA_SOURCE_NAME),
	each(match(name!='DATA_SOURCE_NAME'), $$ = last($$))) ~> DistinctSource
DistinctSource derive(BATCH_ID = 1,
		DATE_CREATED = currentDate(),
		DATE_UPDATED = currentDate()) ~> RunIfo
RunIfo sink(mapColumn(
		DATA_SOURCE_NAME,
		BATCH_ID,
		DATE_CREATED,
		DATE_UPDATED
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> insertingsourcenames
